summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to zoning and land use; adding a new Chapter 23.49 to the Seattle Municipal (Land Use) Code to establish zoning regulations and development standards for downtown Seattle; repealing the Interim Downtown Zoning regulations of existing Chapter 23.49 and Section 23.54.24 and adding a new Section 23.86.32 to Chapter 23.86; amending Chapter 23.84 (Definitions), amending Sections 23.04.10, 23.54.30, 23.66.122, 23.66.140, 23.66.322, 23.66.324, 23.66.326, 23.86.06, 23.86.07, 23.86.28, 23.86.30, 23.80.20; and amending Section 24.52.140 to conform with the new Chapter 23.49.
